scripts.build:run: yarn run lint && yarn run tsc
scripts.build:ci: yarn run clear-build-artifacts && yarn run compile-d-ts-files && yarn run tsc --outDir ./dist-esm && yarn run tsc --module CommonJS --outDir ./dist-cjs && yarn run generate-stub-package-json-for-cjs && yarn run format-output-files
scripts.clear-build-artifacts: rm -rf dist dist-ts dist-cjs dist-esm build
scripts.compile-d-ts-files: yarn run tsc --removeComments false --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationDir ./dist-ts && yarn run copy-d-ts-files && yarn run tsc:plain --project tsconfig.out.json
scripts.format-output-files: yarn run format-output-files-ts && yarn run format-output-files-js
scripts.format-output-files-ts:
find dist-ts -name '*.ts' -type f -exec sh -c "echo '/* eslint-disable */
/* eslint-enable prettier/prettier */'"' | cat - $1 > $1.tmp && mv $1.tmp $1' -- {} \; && eslint --no-eslintrc --config '.eslintrc.out-ts.cjs' --fix './dist-ts/**/*.ts'
scripts.generate-stub-package-json-for-cjs: echo 'const fs = require("fs"); const { version } = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync("package.json")); fs.writeFileSync("dist-cjs/package.json", JSON.stringify({version}));' | node
